Basic:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { HoverCard } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const open = ref(false)
</script>

<template>
  <HoverCard.Root>
    <HoverCard.Trigger>Hover me</HoverCard.Trigger>
    <Teleport to="body">
      <HoverCard.Positioner>
        <HoverCard.Content>
          <HoverCard.Arrow>
            <HoverCard.ArrowTip />
          </HoverCard.Arrow>
          Content
        </HoverCard.Content>
      </HoverCard.Positioner>
    </Teleport>
  </HoverCard.Root>
</template>
Controlled:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { HoverCard } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const open = ref(false)
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="() => (open = true)">Open Dialog</button>
  <HoverCard.Root v-model:open="open">
    <HoverCard.Trigger>Hover me</HoverCard.Trigger>
    <Teleport to="body">
      <HoverCard.Positioner>
        <HoverCard.Content>
          <HoverCard.Arrow>
            <HoverCard.ArrowTip />
          </HoverCard.Arrow>
          Content
        </HoverCard.Content>
      </HoverCard.Positioner>
    </Teleport>
  </HoverCard.Root>
</template>
Positioning:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { HoverCard } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const open = ref(false)
</script>

<template>
  <HoverCard.Root
    :positioning="{
      placement: 'right',
      gutter: 12,
    }"
  >
    <HoverCard.Trigger>Hover me</HoverCard.Trigger>
    <Teleport to="body">
      <HoverCard.Positioner>
        <HoverCard.Content>
          <HoverCard.Arrow>
            <HoverCard.ArrowTip />
          </HoverCard.Arrow>
          Content
        </HoverCard.Content>
      </HoverCard.Positioner>
    </Teleport>
  </HoverCard.Root>
</template>
RenderProp:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { HoverCard } from '@ark-ui/vue'

const open = ref(false)
</script>

<template>
  <HoverCard.Root v-slot="api">
    <HoverCard.Trigger>Hover me {{ api.isOpen ? '▲' : '▼' }}</HoverCard.Trigger>
    <Teleport to="body">
      <HoverCard.Positioner>
        <HoverCard.Content>
          <HoverCard.Arrow>
            <HoverCard.ArrowTip />
          </HoverCard.Arrow>
          Content
        </HoverCard.Content>
      </HoverCard.Positioner>
    </Teleport>
  </HoverCard.Root>
</template>
